actions.text: Amendment SA 856 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 57. Record Vote Number: 208.

Amendment SA 856 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 850. (consideration: CR S7423-7430, S7443-7444; text: CR S7424) To provide for equal liability treatment of vehicle fuels and fuel additives.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 856 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 57. Record Vote Number: 208.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 856 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 57. Record Vote Number: 208.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 856 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 850.

amends_amendment.purpose: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

purpose: To provide for equal liability treatment of vehicle fuels and fuel additives.
